name.ja: ダイナ・ボディ・ヒート

requirement.en: Equip this card to 1 face-up Dinosaur Type monster on your field.

effect.en: The equipped monster cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects, and it inflicts piercing battle damage. During your opponent's turn, while the equipped monster is face-up on your field, it cannot be returned to the hand, Deck, or Extra Deck by card effects.
